casebody.data:
Robert S. MINOWICZ, Jr., Thomas D. Minowicz, and Steven J. Minowicz
v.
Donna P. STEPHENS. No. 616P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Todd R. Cerwin, Shelby, for Stephens. Michael M. Lakin, for Minowicz.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of December 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of January 2007."
